page.title: 05Hailing Dene and the Library
page.content: The Hailing Dene is situated on the Cannock Road. It used to be an old house until it was changed for all of Penkridge to use. Now it has many rooms. Room 1 is a hall and is used for wedding parties etc.. The Parish Council also meet here and disco dancing classes are held. The fourth and sixth Penkridge brownies have their weekly meetings here.Some other brownie packs meet in the other rooms. There is a room where unemployed have their meetings. Weight training takes place in a small gymnasium. Other facilities include a bar selling beer and spirits. We also have a Library near the Hailing Dene where you can join and borrow books providing you take them back on time. The Library is open 5 days a week, closed on Sunday and Monday.
